title: Textile, 1851–63
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave; glazed
description: Three pieces, same design, different colors. A) Ground printed, possibly by "molette," in grey, small check pattern. Design of long sprays of bell-shaped and accented in darker brown, printed over ground design, possibly by surface roller. B) Same design, flowers in dark blue. C) Same with flowers in red with very dark green shadows and accents. Glazed.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1851–63. Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave; glazed. 1967-10-9-c.
